text: Joseph Thomas Logano (born May 27, 1990) is an American racecar driver who drives the No. 22 Ford Mustang in the NASCAR Cup Series for Team Penske. Logano is the 3x NASCAR Cup Series champion. (2018 & 2022, 2024) Until the start of the 2013 season, Logano drove the #20 Home Depot Toyota Camry for Joe Gibbs Racing. Logano won the 2009 rookie of the year award, and with his win at the New Hampshire Motor Speedway became the youngest drive to win a race in NASCAR history. He also won the 2012 Pocono 400 at Pocono Raceway from the pole, ending a 31 race losing streak for pole winners. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:NASCAR drivers Category:American racecar drivers
title: Joey Logano
